$Intro.Welcome:
Welcome to Action Jam - my name is LoloBot and I am your holographic assistant.

What's your name?
$Intro.HelloMyFriend:
Welcome my friend. How can I help you?

Ask me somehing about the 
- weather or temperature 
- coverage of valuable objects
- focus days
$Intro.Sorry: Sorry %s, but I only listen to Lolo. Try again?
$Intro.SorryGoodbye: Sorry - my boss is Lolo. Goodbye
$Focusdays.Winner: Our winner was my friend the 'HailBot'
$Focusdays.HailbotDetails:
He is a claims bot and is there for our customers after a Hailstorm.

It will be our first chat bot in production for AXA Switzerland.

Soon I will not be the only one at AXA.
$Goodbye:
I wish everybody a nice Action Jam event and please invent more friends so I don't have to be alone anymore!

And thanks to the Action Jam organizers for the invitation

Bye
$AXASure.Overview:
AXA Sure is an Innovation Award Winning App.

 Our customers are able to capture a valuable object at home and verify how it is covered in our house hold contracts.


AXA Sure Beta version also has image recognition and a chat bot to create a claim - I love it.

For more details ask my inventor Lolo
